headline: How The Archer-Daniels-Midland (ADM) Investment Narrative Is Shifting With Mixed Analyst Targets
summary: Archer Daniels Midland is back on investors’ radars as fresh research nudges its fair value estimate from about US$59.64 to US$60.73, with price targets clustering between US$57 and US$68. Analysts raising targets while keeping neutral or even Underperform style ratings reflect a split view, where some see room for upside and others argue that current pricing already builds in much of the story. As you read on, you will see how these shifts fit into the broader analyst narrative and how to...
